Description: そこには何が在る？@{M}What's down here?
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|貴方は城塞の入り口に居る。~2|貴方はトンネルの2階層目に居る。~3|貴方はトンネルの3階層目に居る。~5|貴方はトンネルの5階層目に居る。~6|貴方はトンネルの6階層目に居る。~7|貴方はトンネルの7階層目に居る。~8|貴方は城塞最深部に到達した…~9|貴方は城塞最深部に突入した…~4|貴方は城塞の中間地点に居る。@{M}1|You are at the edge of the Citadel.~2|You are in the second tangle of tunnels.~3|You are in the third tangle of tunnels.~5|You are in the fifth tangle of tunnels.~6|You are in the sixth tangle of tunnels.~7|You are in the seventh tangle of tunnels.~8|You have reached the Citadel's root...~9|You have entered the Citadel's root...~4|You have reached the mid-point of the Citadel
Name: 後日談: 砕かれた城塞を探索する@{M}$Shattered Citadel -> 砕かれた砦$Another Day: Venturing into the Shattered Citadel
